name: Cannonball Falls: Race to Destruction
description:
You have one shot to take down the Pirate Ship in Cannonball Falls.

Take aim and fire your last cannon ball down Cannonball Falls to try and knock out the enemy pirate ship. You're able to rotate the magnets in the level to push or pull your cannon ball in the direction you need, but careful, they all spin at the same time! There are also all these pesky birds on the way down, take them out on the way and your score will be multiplied!

Get the highest score by getting down fast, hitting the ship accurately, and taking out birds.

This is a project created for ScoreSpace Jam #15 by a team of 2.

Speedy1619 & Slick5003
